title: Onboarding Flow Sketch
purpose: Show early exploration of 60s onboarding pipeline

messages.author: user
messages.content: Onboarding should deliver value in under a minute. Outline it.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Proposed 60s pipeline: (0-10s) drag & drop recent chat → (10-25s) local parse + segment progress bar → (25-40s) highlight 3 detected micro patterns → (40-55s) generate draft cognitive snapshot → (55-60s) present 'Next Action' card.

messages.author: user
messages.content: good. add explicit privacy reassurance copy early.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Inserted at 6s: 'All processing stays on your device. Optional anonymous pattern sharing later.'

signals: All processing stays on your device

summaries.micro: Assistant proposes 60s onboarding pipeline; user requests privacy copy; assistant adds it; user approves.
summaries.macro: Defines time-bounded value demonstration with integrated privacy messaging for user confidence.
